name: Red coral reef
description:
Piece created with code in Hydra (hydra.ojack.xyz) + JS (based on AlexandreRangel Work). Click to activate sound.

Hydra is a toolkit for live coding of network visuals created by Olivia Jack (ojack.xyz)

/*
 Red Coral Reef
 by Daniel Oropeza
 Tw: @Ferdoropeza
 */

solid(0.6, 0.2, 0.2)
	.add(
		noise(1, 0.2).mask(
			shape(100, 0.6, 0)
				.scale(1, 0.6)
				.modulate(noise(() => time * 0.1, 0.2).luma(0.5))
				.modulateScale(osc(1), -1, 3)
				.colorama(-0.001)
				.scrollY(-0.002)
				.diff(noise(20, 0.1))
				.scrollX(-0.002, 0.002)
				.modulateScale(o0, 0.8)
		)
	)
	.blend(o0, 0.4)
	.out();
